thread.title: It doesn't get any more convenient than this!
thread.title_full: It doesn't get any more convenient than this! - Review of the Quin, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: James C
title: It doesn't get any more convenient than this!
text:
Drive in to midtown Manhattan and hand the doorman the keys. Then start to enjoy being in the Big Apple! Great location for all there is to see and do in New York-- walk to Central Park, stroll Fifth Avenue, walk (it's faster than a cab) to the theater district... it's hard to beat this location.
Staff is friendly and responsive. Rooms are functional, not overly fancy but clean and modern. The entire hotel is new (2013) and furnished to show off the newness. No antiques here. Street noise was minimal (on 57th!). Would definitely return.
Room Tip: can't beat the "free" parking! See more room tips
